LanguageData.DMS_CivilianChild01.description: Since [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a gravity-free environment, [PAWN_pronoun] childhood was spent undergoing rehabilitation and gravity exposure treatments. Although these treatments have allowed [PAWN_pronoun] to move regularly in a normal gravity environment, [PAWN_pronoun] physical condition is still far inferior compared to other children of the same age.
LanguageData.DMS_CivilianChild01.title: Low G Adjuster
LanguageData.DMS_MilitaryChild01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born out of wedlock in the colonial fleet stationed on the planet's surface, and his biological father is unknown. Fortunately, the soldiers stationed in the camp treated [PAWN_pronoun] as one of their own, allowing [PAWN_pronoun] to have a relatively complete childhood.
LanguageData.DMS_MilitaryChild01.title: Garrison child
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild01.description: Due to his outstanding performance in the Colonial Military Academy, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained as an Officer Cadet during his childhood. [PAWN_nameDef] achieved the rank of Warrant Officer upon reaching adulthood.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild01.title: Reserve Officer
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild02.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a colonial planet full of turmoil and used [PAWN_pronoun] flexible skills as messenger on the frontline battlefields full of electromagnetic interference and hostile fire. After the war, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to return to school for an education.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild02.title: Child Orderly
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild03.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were declared Missing in Action during their deployment while he was very young. Due to the Military Martyrdom Clause of the Colonial Fleet, he received a scholarship to support him through the Officer Academy Course.
LanguageData.DMS_OfficerChild03.title: Son of Martyrs
